text: Apani nijeke tadera sansarge abad'dha rakhuna yara sakala o sandhyaya tadera palanakartake tamra santusti arjanera uddesye ahabana kare ebam apani parthiba jibanera saundarya kamana kare tadera theke nijera drsti phiriye nebena na. Yara manake amara smarana theke gaphela kare diyechi, ye, nijera prabrttira anusarana kare ebam yara karya kalapa hacche sima atikrama kara, apani tara anugatya karabena na.
